---
name: Ethereal
type: CH
speed: n/a
armour: n/a
cc: n/a
ff: n/a
special_rules:
  - invulnerable-save
  - leader
notes:
  |
    All units in a formation joined by an Ethereal gain <em>Fearless</em>. If the Ethereal is killed then all these units lose <em>Fearless</em> and the formation receives an additional D3 Blast markers.
weapons:
  -
    id: honour-blade
